ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New Lute in Velk Lab
ygData.msgSnippet: Shada - I would like to add it, though. I wanted to make an additional list of bard-specific weapons and armour for the next FAQ. Also, what site do you
ygData.messageBody:
Shada - I would like to add it, though. I wanted to make an additional list
of bard-specific weapons and armour for the next FAQ.
Also, what site do you recommend I link to for the best information? (ie,
Allakhazam's, Baelish's, EQLizer?)
So the next FAQ will be out tuesday methinks...

Talies

At 11:51 AM 12/30/00 -0500, you wrote:
>don't worry Talies, it's just a weapon that looks like a lute, it's not an
>instrument and has no string bonus. it is 1h blunt 11/23 and procs a mem
>blur.
>
>i have no lute of the howler, but i have all the other stuff Gendal listed
>hehe. i guess i would actually have to play to get one, haven't been on in
>3 weeks thanks to the holidays and other real life stuff.
>
>Shada, 58 Bard
>Afterlife
>
> > Meldodic whositz?
> >
> > Can someone who actually plays go through my instrument list
> > the next time
> > I post the FAQ?
>
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.
